str2: No longer, no more. Also ouk eti from ou and eti; not yet, no longer.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
(a) (as adj.) enslaved, (b) (as noun) a (male) slave. From deo; a slave.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
Gen: in behalf of; acc: above.
(a) (as adj.) enslaved, (b) (as noun) a (male) slave. From deo; a slave.
A brother, member of the same religious community, especially a fellow-Christian. A brother near or remote.
Most of all, especially. Neuter plural of the superlative of an apparently primary adverb mala; most or particularly.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Dative Neuter Singular
str2: How much, how great, how many. From an absolute pos and hos; interrogative pronoun how much (plural) many).

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Flesh, body, human nature, materiality; kindred.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.
